column4: I enabled DMA, it still seems to be quite slow when closing, moving and sometimes opening dialogs; as well as in response time to menu clickes (ie i click a menu item and it takes 3-5 seconds for the popup to come up, and sometimes i have to click it again). it seems sluggish switching between applications. any advice on how to fix this or is this just linux?
linux is as fast if not faster than windows
